de.chiller.vigral.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.chiller.vigral.settings.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    singleton class that is responsible for saving and loading the settings
    Author:
    Simon Schiller
